<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Add Ports</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/ports"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://api.fotbo.com

Retrieve a list of ports associated with the user's account.
You may not have services or there may not be funds on your balance to complete this operation.
